result.eng: That is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ga: sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.orig: sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábhar
result.html: sin iomlán m'eolais ar an ábharThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.
result.ponchtml: sin iomlán m'eolais ar an áḃarThat is the total extent of my knowledge on the subject.

result.eng: I know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ga: tá fios an bhealaigh agam
result.orig: tá fios an bhealaigh agam
result.html: tá fios an bhealaigh agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ponchtml: tá fios an ḃealaiġ agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
